TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IWin32Window

summary.span: Win32 HWND 핸들을 노출하기 위한 인터페이스를 제공합니다.

span.span: Provides an interface to expose Win32 HWND handles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 인터페이스는 HWND Win32 핸들을 노출 하는 개체에 구현 됩니다.This interface is implemented on objects that expose Win32 HWND handles. 결과 핸들은 Win32 API 호출에 사용할 수 있습니다.The resultant handle can be used with Win32 API calls. ## Examples 다음 예에서는 속성 `label1` 현재 의 `Form1`합니다.The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. 이 예에서는 있다고 가정는 호출 `Form1` 와 호출 `label1` 에 있습니다.This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 구현자가 나타내는 창에 대한 핸들을 가져옵니다.

span.span: Gets the handle to the window represented by the implementer.
A handle to the window represented by the implementer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 값은 구현자에 따라는 속성 창의 기간 동안 변경 수 없습니다.Depending on the implementer, the value of the property could change during the life of the window. ## Examples 다음 예에서는 속성 `label1` 현재 의 `Form1`합니다.The following example sets the property of `label1` to the current of `Form1`. 이 예에서는 있다고 가정는 호출 `Form1` 와 호출 `label1` 에 있습니다.This example assumes that you have a called `Form1` with a called `label1` on it. [!code-cpp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IWin32Window Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic IWin32Window Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
